original_title: Power Rangers Ninja Storm: Nowhere to Grow
overview: The seeds of destruction grow out of hand as the Florabundicus fiend sow botanical bombshells to destroy the world. Disobeying Sensei, Cam gets in over his head trying to cut off crazy Kelzaks from the potent water source that will sprout an unearthly garden party. Shane powers to the rescue, but the other Rangers are totally in danger as flower power goes on a twisted rampage. It's going to take mighty Megazord strength and swift ninja swords to whack the wile weeds and send them into the oblivion they deserve.
title: Power Rangers Ninja Storm: Nowhere to Grow
